item.title: Artificial Intelligence Virtual Experience Program - Cognizant
item.description: Gala Groceries is a technology-led grocery store chain based in the USA. They rely heavily on new technologies, such as IoT to improve their supply chain which gives them a competitive edge over other grocery stores.

item.title: Data Science & Analytics Virtual Experience Program - BCG
item.description: PowerCo supplies gas and electricity to corporate, SME, and residential customers. The changing energy market in Europe has led many SMEs to switch away from PowerCo, making customer retention challenging.
